title: Heart Strike
description: DELTA The deadliest elite counter-terrorism unit on the planet• A precision strike force• The most out-of-the-box thinkers in any military• Will die to get the mission done SERGEANT RICHIE "Q" The smartest soldier on any teamSERGEANT MELISSA "THE CAT" Newest on the team, determined to be the best Rescued from an icy mountaintop by a Delta operative, Melissa Moore has never met a challenge she can't conquer. Not only she will make Delta Force, she will be the best female warrior in The Unit, and woe to anyone who says otherwise. Technical wizard Richie Goldman is Bond's "Q" turned warrior. A genius about everything except women, he takes point on the team's most dangerous mission yet. When the Delta Force team goes undercover in the depths of the Colombian jungle, surviving attacks from every side requires that Richie and Melissa strike right at the heart of the matter...and come out with their own hearts intact.
author: M.L. Buchman
